scripts.build_prod: npm run build && npm run browserify && npm run delete_remote_host && npm run minify && npm run copy_mac && npm run replace_app_yaml
scripts.copy: cp --parents node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js dist && cp --parents node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.js dist && cp --parents node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js dist && cp --parents node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.src.js dist && cp --parents node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist && cp -r css dist && cp -r images dist && cp -r js dist && cp -r app_html dist && cp -r fonts dist && cp app.yaml dist && cp php.ini dist && cp index.php dist && cp robots.php dist && cp sitemap.php dist && cp -r js dist && cp -r back dist && cp -r api dist && mkdir dist\node_modules\bootstrap\dist && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist dist/node_modules/bootstrap/
scripts.copy_mac: rsync -R node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js dist && rsync -R node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.js dist && rsync -R node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js dist && rsync -R node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.src.js dist && rsync -R node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist && cp -r css dist && cp -r images dist && cp -r js dist && cp -r app_html dist && cp -r fonts dist && cp app.yaml dist && cp php.ini dist && cp index.php dist && cp robots.php dist && cp sitemap.php dist && cp -r js dist && cp -r back dist && cp -r api dist && mkdir -p dist/node_modules/bootstrap/dist && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist dist/node_modules/bootstrap/
scripts.build_deploy_prod: npm run build_prod && npm run deploy_prod
scripts.build_deploy_promote_prod: npm run build_prod && npm run deploy_promote_prod
